puzzle.title: Connection
puzzle.hint: Each of the eight reels represents a Bond movie - for example, reel 7 is A View To A Kill

The eight Bond movies are, in reel order:
- Goldfinger - The Living Daylights - Quantum of Solace - Dr. No - For Your Eyes Only - You Only Live Twice - A View To A Kill - Die Another Day
Find the number each Bond movie is in the official sequence (Skyfall = 23)
Replace the movie numbers using A=1, B=2, C=3, and you should find another type of 'bond'. That is the answer.
The solution is COVALENT (another type of Bond!)
